author: wn.com
title: Raiders Headed In Right Direction; Have Strong Pieces To Build Upon (Oakland Raiders)
text: ( Source : Oakland Raiders ) The 2015 Oakland Raiders have shown an ability to adjust from week to week, shore up deficiencies as the young season goes on, and adapt as injuries strike. There are many encouraging signs that the team is better
